raw_text:
AFCS OPERATION Embraer Legacy 450/500 and Praetor 500/600 Vertical Modes Pro Line Fusion® Avionics

The target airspeed for FLCH mode will be set to VMO-5, or MMO-0.02, as appropriate. The Approach Status Right/Emergency Descent Status ﬁeld on FMA will display EDM in green, while EDM is active. Autothrottle will also be automatically engaged and reduce throttles to idle. EDM will remain active until AP is disengaged or a new vertical mode is selected.
